DOC.brief_summary: To assess the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics, and pharmacodynamics of ascending, single subcutaneous or intravenous doses of IMA-026 in healthy Japanese male subjects
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating IMA-026 in Healthy Japanese Males
DOC.criteria: Men ages 20 to 40 years, inclusive, at screening Body mass index (BMI) in the range of 17.6 to 26.4 kg/m2 and body weight > 45 kg Healthy as determined by the investigator on the basis of medical history, physical examination, clinical laboratory test results, vitals signs, and 12 lead ECG.
